title: HELP CLIENT ISNT OPENING
body: So i try to open lol and whenever i open it it shows me the following messege(WE HAVE RESTORED THE INSTALLASION TO AN OLDER VERSION OF LEAGUE OF LEGENDS.NOW WE`LL TRY TO PATCH IT UP TO THE LATEST VERSION.)after that i click okay then it writes a nother messege(THERE WAS A PROBLEM PATCHING LEAGUE OF LEGENDS WE`LL RESTORE A BACKUP VERSION AND TRY UPDATING AGAIN AFTER U RESTART THE PATHCER.)i dont know what to do i clicked restart multiple times nothing happens same messege again and again i restarted my pc nothing happends if anyone know what i ahve to do pls tell me.Also it entered one time and it said (there was an error 404) please help me

replies.body: It sounds like your client is having a mix of a couple different problems here. The client is trying to apply those patches, but it might not have all of the correct admin settings in place still. Run through and update your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but also try using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **force repatch**.
I need help I get the same problem and a lot of people are having the same problem but without the 404 error. I tried using the tool but it just crashes! I need help! WE ALL DO!
I was having the same issue and I followed the steps Broporo mentioned (I updated windows, and ran the game as an administrator). This fixed the issue for me.

I'm having the same problem.  It started right after my last match, about 11:30 central.  I had been playing all morning with no problems.  I have not seen the error 404 message though.  The client just keeps restarting and never fixes itself.  I also downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool and try to run the "force repatch" option, however, the tool just crashes.  Help!  SOS
I have this same problem as well!
